en.title: 100 "4 Days 3 Nights Beijing Holidays" To Be Won!!
en.content:
Competition Period 1: From 15th July 2009 - 14th August 2009. 

Competition Period 2: From 15th August 2009 - 14th September 2009.  

Qualifications: 

The Winners of each Competition Period 1 & 2 will be the TOP 50 Members with the HIGHEST NUMBER OF DIRECT SALES SPONSORSHIPS during the Competition Periods as stated above.  All Winners (total 100 from both Competition Periods) will be given a Free Holiday Trip in November 2009, the final dates to be announced soon.

Terms & Conditions: 

1) Holiday Trip is non-transferable, non-convertible to cash & non-exchangeable in kind. 

2) Management reserves the right to change to another similar holiday package depending on availability.

3) Management reserves the right to deny the Holiday Trip but will compensate appropriately. 

4) Direct Sales Sponsorships must be registered to new members, without an existing FusionExcel member
    account. Name of new members must be their IC or passport names. Contact information and proof of
    identity for the new member will be required for verification purposes. 

5) Maximum 8 accounts under 1 name will be taken into consideration when counting the number of Direct
    Sales Sponsorships. Additional accounts under the same name will not be counted for competition
    purposes. 

6) Winners of Competition Period 1 are allowed to participate in the Competition Period 2.

7) The Management reserves the right to deny the Holiday Trip if the Management has reason to believe 
    manipulation or insufficient proof of identity of new member is provided. The decision of the Management
    is final.
